state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- Well, here we are in the bedroom. Let's see what's in here. You can see a closed chest drawer. You make out an antique trunk. You see a king-size bed. You shudder, but continue examining the king-size bed. The king-size bed is ordinary. The king-size bed appears to be empty. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1

next_state: -= Kitchen =- You've just sauntered into a kitchen. You begin looking for stuff. Oh, great. Here's a refrigerator. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a counter. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a counter? The counter is usual. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You can make out a stove. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a stove, go to TextWorld. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stove. Were you looking for a kitchen island? Because look over there, it's a kitchen island. The kitchen island is typical. On the kitchen island you see a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/12

admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island
